overview: Going to college means that farm girl Wendy Phillips must leave her boyfriend Jeb, after a literal roll in the hay, of course. At college, Wendy meets coeds Paige, Catty, and Elaine and their boyfriends Phil, Danny, and Bruner. The boys' hobby of secret videotaping comes in handy when Dean Plumm extorts sex from Wendy. Blackmail gives the frat boys license to party hearty, and they do. Wendy receives a "Dear Joan" letter from Jeb, so she's free, too.
title: Campus Cuties
